text: Paddy Moloney (; 1 August 1938 â€“ 11 October 2021) was an Irish musician, composer, and producer. He co-founded and led the Irish musical group The Chieftains. He died on 11 October 2021, aged 83. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Irish composers Category:Musicians from Dublin Category:Irish record producers
